channel.title: Azure Storage on Steve Griffith
channel.description: Recent content in Azure Storage on Steve Griffith

item.title: New Blog
item.description: Overview Over the last few years at Microsoft I’ve worked with a lot of people to help them out with Azure, and generally when I’ve solved a problem I’ve put the resolution in my public github. Unfortunately this isnt really the best place for that content..or at least the text side of it, so I decided to start moving this content over to a new personal blog. The issue with setting up a blog, however, is that I had a lot of requirements.
